Product Name: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Starlight Aluminum Case with Starlight Sport Band S/M. Fitness & Sleep Tracker, Crash Detection, Heart Rate Monitor

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
This review is a bit delayed, but I didn’t want to forget sharing how great the Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) has been.

**Gift and Price**
I purchased this smartwatch for my wife for Mother’s Day, and she absolutely loves it. I got it at a great price, which made the purchase even better.

**Ease of Use**
The watch is very easy to use, which is perfect for my wife who isn’t very tech-savvy. The intuitive interface and seamless integration with her iPhone have made it a breeze for her to navigate and utilize its features.

**Features**
- **Fitness & Sleep Tracker**: The fitness and sleep tracking features are excellent. It provides accurate and helpful insights into her daily activities and sleep patterns.
- **Crash Detection**: The crash detection feature adds a layer of safety, giving both of us peace of mind.
- **Heart Rate Monitor**: The heart rate monitor is reliable and has helped her stay on top of her health.
- **Carbon Neutral**: The carbon-neutral aspect is a nice touch, aligning with our efforts to be more environmentally conscious.

**Overall**
The Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) has been a fantastic addition to my wife’s daily routine. Its ease of use, comprehensive features, and stylish design make it an excellent choice.

**Pros**:
- Easy to use
- Great fitness and sleep tracking
- Crash detection for added safety
- Reliable heart rate monitor
- Environmentally friendly (carbon neutral)
- Stylish design and comfortable sport loop

**Cons**:
- None noted

Highly recommend this smartwatch for anyone looking for a feature-rich, user-friendly wearable. It’s been a perfect gift!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: This is a good entry level smartwatch. Does all the functions I’d want. Main use for the watch is heart rate and exercise so this covers it well. Wish the battery would last longer but turning off unnecessary functions helps with battery life.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I've had several fitness and smartwatches over the years, but the Apple Watch SE truly stands out. This watch is incredibly accurate in tracking active calories burned, which has been essential for maintaining my calorie deficit eating plan. The heart rate monitoring, especially during my morning cardio workouts, is spot on. The look and fit of the band are excellent, although there's a bit of a learning curve to fastening it securely, but once it's on, it stays put.

One minor drawback is the battery life; it does tend to be quite power-hungry. After watching a few YouTube videos and tweaking some settings, I managed to conserve battery life more effectively. However, you'll still need to charge it daily for about an hour. Despite this, the features and accuracy of the Apple Watch SE make it a worthy investment, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable fitness partner and stylish accessory.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I'm absolutely thrilled with my Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) purchase! After comparing prices across multiple sellers, I found an unbeatable deal here that made this already affordable smartwatch an even better value.
The SE (2nd Gen) packs most of the essential features you'd want in a smartwatch without the premium price tag of the higher-end models. It tracks my workouts, monitors my heart rate, and even detects falls - all while seamlessly syncing with my iPhone.
The battery life is impressive, easily lasting me through a full day of use. The retina display is crisp and bright, making it easy to read notifications and track my fitness goals at a glance.
What really sets this purchase apart is the price. I saved a significant amount compared to other retailers, making this smartwatch an absolute steal. If you're in the market for a reliable, feature-rich Apple Watch without breaking the bank, look no further than this listing for the SE (2nd Gen).
In summary: top-notch quality, all the essential features, and an unbeatable price. Five stars all the way!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love the watch so far, it’s easy to use and it’s exactly what I’m looking for. The only annoying thing is that the charger it came with does not work very well and Amazon told me I either had to send back the whole thing, or nothing. So I ended up having to buy a two pack of chargers. They work great.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Fast shipping and exactly what I wanted. Charged it up once it arrived and have had no problems since. I found the major difference for this model and the series 9 is the “Always On” feature and heart monitoring. Personally, I can set the screen to stay on for 90 seconds which is plenty of time to figure out what time it is. I also don’t need that in depth heart tracking… Overall great price for a smart watch and shipping was fast and easy!!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Purchased this watch after my other one broke. I bought it on prime day and it’s very durable. I went swimming and work out with the watch a lot. The battery lasts longer than a day and a half. It was pretty easy to sync up with my phone. The print when reviewing texts or messages is clear.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I really love this watch and have been learning how to use all of the different tools available. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. The only downside is having to charge it every day, but it’s really not a big deal since I’m also charging my phone at the same time.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I bought this watch for my father who is having some vertigo and lives alone. This watch can tell if the person wearing it has taken a hard fall and it will call 911 if the person does not respond within a short period of time. The watch will also call any persons designated on the iPhone health app as emergency contacts. I set both these features up on the phone and if you need instructions you should be able to find these on the web easily enough; I followed a video on YouTube.

I personally have an AmazFit watch which I really like because it helps me track my steps and alerts me to stand up and move every hour. I can easily set goals and track my progress daily and it also tracks my heart rate and sleep patterns. The Apple watch may ultimately be able to do some of these things too through the health application, but the appl is a bit of a rabbit hole and I was unable to set it up for my dad. Standing and moving for a few minutes every hour is a good health goal and I hoped the Apple Watch would alert him to do this (as my far cheaper watch does). It may very well be out there somewhere, but I could not find it. Please comment with instructions if you know how.

The Apple watch is otherwise terrific in so many ways. One can set up alerts for taking medication, it will track and alert heart rate and warn you if it is going to high or low. My dad was using it with voice commands within a day of setting it up. You do not have to say, hey Siri, just hold in the button and say call 'x' and you can just talk the person right from your watches speaker phone which works great. You can likewise set and appointment or alarm and other voice commands in similar fashion. This is particularly helpful for tired old fingers; no searching or typing required.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I did a lot of research on the most accurate fitness tracker and found that Apple watches do very well, better than most others, when tested against real medical equipment. The SE 2nd gen is the cheapest one that has all the same sensors as the newer, significantly more expensive models (minus the single lead EKG on the newest models, but that wasn't worth the many hundreds extra to me). I've had mine now for a couple months and couldn't be happier. I only cared about the fitness tracking features, but I have to say I'm a fan of getting notifications through the watch for messages and emails. It's nice to be able to leave my phone sitting somewhere away from me in a room and not have to go by to tap on it every once in a while to see if I missed any messages (I always leave my phone on silent and don't always hear the buzz of it vibrating if I have music on or something). Having all the metrics for my workouts and even just my normal day to day stuff like the step tracker is worth its weight in gold to me. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Convenience is the name of the game here. The ability to use my iPhone without having to pull it out of my pocket or holster. A hands free option to take or make phone calls and texts. The ability to view my health/exercise data while on the move without reaching for my iPhone. Being able to control my music while listening, here again while on the move without grabbing my phone. Getting a look at the time and using Apple Pay without pulling out my phone. So much this watch does and more…. So much convenience built in. The only downside is that it drains my phones battery much quicker, I find myself limiting the time I use the watch each day to the times it would bring the most convenience, then turning my iPhones Bluetooth off to give me better battery life for the day. I didn’t want cellular due to the extra cost it would impose on my monthly phone bill. The fitness tracker part of the watch still does work without using my phone so Bluetooth isn’t necessary while wearing it, but I lose all the other nice functions. The reality is one must plan the watches usage throughout the day to where you get the best battery usage out of both phone and watch…. I’ve been able to stretch the watches battery to about 48 hours through thrifty use of the watch while preserving my phones daily battery life.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I wanted to get a smartwatch that wouldn’t break the bank but also had a variety of features..this is just that, the battery is decent, you can disable some of the feature to prolong the battery life. The durability of the watch itself is pretty good, but i work at a brewery so i bought case for it and it’s been phenomenal ever since. Hooking it up to my phone was a breeze, it prompts you to install the newest software which only takes a few minutes. Phone calls on this thing is pretty good, sound quality and mic are great. I went with the 44mm option so i could see the screen a little better but whatever floats your boat.

Overall if you’re looking for a low-budget option, this may be the way to go. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
Hate disruptions every second of the day, so I have imprisoned my Apple Watch to just play Apple Music while I exercise at the gym. Not an easy task with new tech devices ‘cause they wish to intervene at every breath.
Closed every possible app allowed, prolonging the ridiculous short battery life and provide 5 hours of splendidly bad 90’s-2010 get your body movin’ music for gym visits!
Life is beautiful. La Vie Est Belle!
Hate to say but luv, luv, luv my Apple Watch!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Watch is fairly easy to navigate, and has many apps and functions. I’m still learning about them. It pairs easily with iPhone for texts and calls. I was surprised that the watch battery does not last a day, and should be charged every day or night. Charging is pretty fast. My Garmin watch allowed me to turn GPS off, and on only when needed for activities. When Garmin GPS is off the battery lasts a week. The Apple watch band is comfortable and easy to clasp on the wrist. There are many choices for watch face style per individual taste. I’m happy overall with the watch.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
My story may be a little different from most
I bought my Apple Watch because I had been having EKG’s and all showing normal
I knew I was having problems and the watch would catch my heart rate down into the 30’s beats per minute
Showed the watch records to Cardiologist
A little more testing and now I have a pacemaker
So in my case the Apple Watch is a life saver

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Such a beautiful and well put together watch. I use this watch on an everyday basis for multiple reasons such as listening to music, picking up or declining calls (hands free), messaging , setting timers and reminders, checking the weather, HEALTH, and style. This is a very reliable product and I do recommend this to anyone that is searching for these qualities.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: This is my first apple watch. I got it on prime day and wear it every day! I like the safety features, the health features including the heart monitor. Most of all I'm blind so I use voiceover which is an accessibility feature that's built in with all apple products. With the use of voiceover this watch is totally accessible!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I bought it as a gift for my girlfriend and maaaan she loved it! Setting it up was simple we just connected it to her iPhone. She was excited about all the features. The watch tracks her workouts, reminds her to stand up, and even helps with her breathing exercises. She also loves getting notifications and messages on her wrist. There was a small problem when she first tried to sync it, but restarting her phone fixed it. Now, she uses it every day. It looks stylish, and she enjoys having it. Great gift for anyone!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I got this new updated Apple Watch because I wanted to use the sleep method to track how much REM sleep I actually get but I can’t seem to get it set up to work:( Everything else is the same as old Nike Apple Watch but the battery is better.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I love this watch I find myself wearing it more than I do wearing my Samsung Galaxy 6 watch with my S23 Ultra phone everything is soooo smooth glad I made the purchase the only thing left to do now is upgrade my 2nd gen Apple SE phone thanks for a hands down great purchase
10/10!!!!!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I really just bought this watch for the Snoopy animations on the Peanuts watchface - there's a ton of them that cycle through on each raise. Aside from that, the technology all works and it's brightened up my day on more than one occasion - I couldn't have asked for more.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love the color. I bought this for my mom and it’s a really nice color. Don’t know about the performance about the watch itself but my mom hasn’t complained. If she has any negative feedback, I’ll be sure to update the post.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: The watch came with a charging cable and watch band. I thought I had ordered 44mm but this one is a 40mm. I like the size difference so I’m glad it ended up being smaller. It was really easy to connect the watch to my phone. Overall I am very satisfied!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Very good watch for everyday use, battery life is great unlike the other apple watches where the screen stays on for a longer period of time so this watch only lights up when needed and this saves a ton of battery for everyday use. On a day for 10 hours of usage only 30% gets drained and that is very good for everyday use.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: The watch is exactly what I wanted and what I ordered. I'm very happy with it. The only complaint I have is that it arrived without a user manual. When I called Apple, And requested one, it seemed to be an annoyance! However, there's always Google and YouTube videos, so I figured it out. I love the watch.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I have had an Apple Watch for six years and I love it despite its clunky appearance. This new one, in black, is a bit smaller with a nicer (black) band that was easy to slip on. Everything transferred over and seems about the same. I have one complaint. The charger that comes with it needs a special adapter, which must be ordered from Apple for an extra $20. The charger for the old watch works, but it is unreliable, which is why I got a new watch. Having to order an extra part made me angry. However, Apple support was easy to contact and very nice. So, five stars.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I got this watch for my birthday and I’m in love. The quality is amazing, literally. Scratch resistance but I’d advise buyers to get a case with a screen protector. It’s readable and easy to use. It was very easy to set up and connect to my phone. I wear it everywhere I just change the bands.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I bought this watch for my wife and she loves it. She sets her mapmywalk app on our morning walks and it tracks our walk perfectly. She likes how she can change the color of her watch screen to match her blouse
N

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: This Apple Watch just arrived and so far it’s been great. The sports band is not my favorite as it pinches my skin when putting it on, but the color of it is still cute. The screen on the watch is brighter than I expected and the sensitivity of the watch face is lovely. I would recommend getting some sort of screen protector or a case because it does seem that maybe one good drop would crack it all up. But definitely recommended this watch! Not to big too which is what I was worried about.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: New apple watch user here! I LOVE IT. Not disappointed at ALL. I’ve been contemplating buying one and I am so glad I was able to snag it for a great deal! It was so easy to set up, it took me a little while to figure out how it to work it but it, but it was nothing a little googling couldn’t fix. I was also skeptical about the battery life, but I used it for a whole day and it was only at 65%. I also have my phone on low battery mode to make my battery last and so I did with the watch so it lasted even longer! LOVE IT would recommend this to anyone looking for a beginner watch…

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Perfect size! Looks just like it did on the package! It wouldn't connect to my iphone until i updated to the newest IOS update. That was annoying! But the watch itself was nice perfect for me!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I’m still learning all of the functions. It is a replacement watch as the first one literally fell apart after several years. It is updated with different functions and some I miss from the older watch. The price point sold me, overall, I’m pleased. Not estatic.. .

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: This is my second Apple Watch. My first one lasted 12 years! I love all the features and the ability of my Watch to connect to the app that monitors my healthcare discount program.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I had been using a Fitbit but was excited to get the Apple Watch for fitness tracking. It took me a bit to figure out what everything was and I’m now pretty comfortable with the device. The one thing I’m disappointed in is the battery having to be charged every day and it takes about an hour to fully charge.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Gift for the wife. She likes the convenience of the the health tracker, message reader, phone alerts. I even offered to upgrade her to the higher level Apple watch, but she is quite happy to keep the SE. So far no problems.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love how I can see texts without looking at my phone! It helps me see my exercise circle easier and text messages. I also love how well it records exercises and steps!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I bought this to keep track of steps, various exercises and sleep. I love it! I’d like the battery to stay charged longer but otherwise it’s really great. Fast shipment.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I like the media updates and other features but right now I use the health and fitness features of the phone. I am still learning how to use it, but so enjoy it very much.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Been using it for the past week and so far I’m loving it! I just found out you can also download music from Spotify to use on your watch offline if you are wanting to leave your phone behind.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I like the health tracker, I feel it provides more accurate data than the Fitbit I used for the last year. Also like the safety of SOS warning. Love the variety of watch faces available. I turned off the lift to activate display hoping to get longer battery life, and it does seem to help. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase and as a woman in her 60s found it fairly easy to figure out settings and such,

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I recently purchased this watch and really like how it fits my wrist. I previously had the 42mm size Apple Watch and always felt like it was to big. The aluminum color is easy to match with.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love the watch now that I could get it to turn on. I did everything I was supposed to do. Ended up my charger was defective.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Love my new Apple Watch SE it does everything that I need to do. Couldn’t be the price and the value that you get

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: The Apple Watch certainly does more than the Fitbit I had previously, but the battery doesn’t last nearly as well. The max life is only 18 hours and if you accidentally leave an app open you’re running down the battery. I’ve had to remove the watch a second time during the day to charge it up again, which is inconvenient. I’m still trying to figure out what’s best to have available verses what just eats up the battery.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love the watch, not only does it tells time but it has music, Siri, track your heart as well as your activities

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I had a watch like this before, which I used especially for my workouts to map my progress. This time around, however, I changed the velcro band to a leather one because the Velcro band held all the moisture.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I couldn’t resist the Prime Day price. I mostly bought it to track my sleep & health. Not sure what else I’m really gonna use it for.
It arrived in one piece and seems to work.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I wish it had the wireless cellular but besides that it’s easy to use and I am in love with my new watch. I bought new didn’t want to risk getting a bad product but it was definitely worth every penny!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: My series 5 stopped working and was unable to frix, glad i found and purchased this on Prime Day well worth the $$$ and saved as well. very pleased.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I bought this because I live by myself. A week after getting it, I fell in the yard. I was able to call my son for help. This watch may be refurbished but I would never have known. A great purchase.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Love it works great!! The only thing is I wish it came with the wall plug in.. just came w the cord but other then that it’s great!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
Update: The battery adjusts to your needs over time just like the optimized charging with an iPhone. There’s a setting to turn that off with the watch.

The battery life is really terrible. If you're an active person, the battery gets drained so quickly and it doesn't recharge quickly at all. The only thing positive about this is that it's fairly low priced for an apple watch.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love my new Apple Watch! It does everything my phone does almost and I like look of it

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love it so much! I am switching from a series 2 and this is perfect! The watch itself is the same size, but a bigger screen. It works perfectly and is great for tracking my steps, taking calls, and doing things without pulling my phone out. Great purchase!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I already have an Apple Watch however I got the larger one and it's just too big for my wrist. The smaller one is just right and the SE has more features than my bigger one. I would order this again. I also bought the smaller wrist bands for this watch. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Apple hit it out of the park with this watch! It has everything I need on it and more! Love the silver and blue color!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: smaller face than what I had before. I had to use the largest fonts to read

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love that it tracks my step but also my sleep and workouts. It has greatly improved how I process the info to better myself

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: No hay mucho más que pueda agregar, luego en excelente calidad, es el producto esperado original, todo perfecto

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: The watch is great! It fits great & looks great! I have not ha any problems with it. It works they way I expected it to work.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Only had watch a few days.....but....when it arrived...the USB C magnetic power cord doesn't come with adapter....so trying to order one to fit the cord. It isn't the same as my apple 13 phone so I couldn't use the adapter with the cord.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love how I can text or call when I am unable to get to my phone! Definitely helps especially with having a child! It was very easy to setup and just great all around! I love seeing how many steps I can get in a day! Just wish the charging lasted a little longer than a day!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: So I took the plunge and got the Apple SE. It’s the least expensive of the apples but I’m not sure what other features I really need. It works perfectly for me.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Was having problems with my Watch7 syncing to my airpods, or just running music. So I thought I'd try a new hardware version. Upside, on sale this is a good deal. Most of the functionality of the premium watch for a fraction of the price. Functionality does seem better, but still isn't perfect (man, how does apple mess up the software for something that seems this simple?). Battery, not quite as good but adequate for most days. Recommend.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Very nice watch. Wanted one, but didn’t want to spend a lot. Good price

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Debated getting an Apple Watch for a long time, I was unsure how much I’d use or enjoy it but I took advantage of the prime day deal and I absolutely love it and wish I had gotten it sooner!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I absolutely love love love this watch and everything about it. It’s even waterproof as I wear it in the pool. If you want a fun way to loose weight or even just track your calories burned this is it.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love my new watch. It is easy to use, and the quality is outstanding. The watch was also delivered in great condition with no damages. Finally, it was easy to set up. I made a great purchase. Thanks, Amazon.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I actually had the larger watch face but accidentally broke it. I got this one as a replacement since Apple wanted to charge me the same price to fix my other one. I like this one better! Comes with a very cute sport band that dries quickly and doesn’t cause skin issues from sweat while working out.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: the watch is great no need for an EKG mode, it does what it says on Apple, easy set up . The watch as to be charged every evenings

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Excelente producto, el tamaño de este Apple Watch es perfecto para el brazo de una mujer. La entrega fue muy rápida.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Absolutely love this apple watch model! Exactly what I needed when I bought it! Came in perfect condition and super easy to set up.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I went back and forth for a long time on which watch to buy. In the end I went with the SE, and and very happy I did. After looking at all the features offere, the SE seemed to have everything I needed without the extra expense. After recieving and using it for a while, it is perfect. At the end of the day it does everything I need; one of the more expensive models would just have been a waste of money!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Pensé al ser el hermano menor iba a estar limitado pero tiene todo lo de sus hermanos mayores a un precio más accesible

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Love it! Very easy to pair with my phone and I use it everyday. I also enjoy that the charger is magnetic.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Producto entregado con exito y en bjen estado funcional 100 % confiable para USA y Guatemala

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Great price for the product. Amazon always seems to have the best deals on Apple devices and I’ve never received a counterfeit device.

Reviews.Review Text: I love my Watch! It was cheaper on Amazon than anywhere else I could find!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: the watch tracks my movement and steps so it is a great tool for tracking progress

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Bought this one to replace my dinosaur Apple Watch that broke after 8 years. It’s slightly bigger but not bulky, very comfortable. It has all the functionality I need for the price! Very pleased!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: The watch is great along with the color. Your phone has to have iOS 17 to operate this watch.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Literally Perfect condition buying the $125 one. No need to spend more for a brand new one. Even included the original box!

Reviews.Review Text: I’m using it to keep track of excercise, medication, it’s working great.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: My first Apple watch. I got used to it in one day. Like it very much

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Like the watch fine but the battery life could be longer. It is completely gone before the end of the second day so essentially it has to be recharged every night. I didn't realize this when I bought it.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I can’t keep my phone in the hand al the time but is necesary for my work. The Watch can do the Job of the phone with my hands free

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: i invrstigated what watch i wanted to buy for wife so i called apple twice and talked to 2 different people. the young person wanted to sell me top of line but it had to many bells and whistles my wife did not want. so called again got super woman told her situation and she recommended this watch. so after i was done amazon apple for apple was so much left so bought it with warranty got it next day and its super she loves it. she new basically what to do but did not know other things so we called apple for hour and half this great person showed us everything. so it proves you get info from apple and buy from amazon.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: The watch was a little dirty on the sensory pad but nothing a little sanitary cloth can’t fix! The button, crown, and screen were in perfect condition! I love it!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I loved the watch but I have an older IPhone which wasn’t capable with the watch.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Same product sold at any electronics store but at a significant discount. It came in quick and product was in flawless condition. Would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I love that so much ❤️💕 is really good

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Love my Apple Watch!! It has so many options and things you can track. I love to wear it to sleep to track my sleep patterns and readiness in the morning. It is also super durable and hasn’t scratched. Wear it every day and still in great shape!

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I wanted a smart watch to track my steps. This has so many more features than I could’ve ever imagined, I love the size of the screen, making it easy to see messages, time and any other information I need.
They says the 44 mm watch and there are many cool bands and screen protectors on Amazon to purchase for it making it fun and exciting to wear every day.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: My wife loves it, but it falls off of her wrist a lot because of the band.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I have absolutely loved this product and saved up for so long to get it which made it all the more worth it. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Review Text: I’m very happy with this watch. It has everything I need.
